column1: Send transaction email when order status is changed. The transaction emails are defined in System > Order Statuses.
column2: Send transaction email when order status is changed. The transaction emails are defined in System > Order Statuses.

column1: By default Magento protects order state to be manually set to Complete and Closed. With this option you can override such behaviour.
column2: By default Magento protects order state to be manually set to Complete and Closed. With this option you can override such behaviour.

column1: % order(s) status has been changed to %
